ROCCA Word Clouds

Author

Allie Sniezek

Published

September 5, 2024

Part 1: 2013

# Define the path to the CSV file
csv_path <- "/Users/alexandrasniezek/Desktop/DS 3262/taiwan_2013_NationalDefenseReport_subset.csv"

# Read the CSV file into a data frame
csv_df <- read.csv(csv_path, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
docs <- tm::Corpus(tm::VectorSource(csv_df$Line))



docs_clean <- docs |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removeNumbers) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removeWords, tm::stopwords("english")) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::stripWhitespace) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removePunctuation) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::stemDocument) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removePunctuation)
Warning in tm_map.SimpleCorpus(docs, tm::removeNumbers): transformation drops
documents
Warning in tm_map.SimpleCorpus(tm::tm_map(docs, tm::removeNumbers),
tm::removeWords, : transformation drops documents
Warning in tm_map.SimpleCorpus(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(docs, tm::removeNumbers),
: transformation drops documents
Warning in tm_map.SimpleCorpus(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(docs,
tm::removeNumbers), : transformation drops documents
Warning in
tm_map.SimpleCorpus(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(docs, :
transformation drops documents
Warning in
tm_map.SimpleCorpus(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(tm::tm_map(docs,
: transformation drops documents

Document Term Matrix

library(tm)
Loading required package: NLP
dtm <- DocumentTermMatrix(docs_clean,
                                    control = list(weighting = weightTfIdf,
                                                   stopwords = TRUE,
                                                   tolower = TRUE,
                                                   removeNumbers = TRUE,
                                                   removePunctuation = TRUE,
                                                   stemming = TRUE))

ignored

Word Cloud:

library(wordcloud)
Loading required package: RColorBrewer
freq <- colSums(as.matrix(dtm))
wordcloud(names(freq), freq, max.words = 100)
Warning in wordcloud(names(freq), freq, max.words = 100): nation could not be
fit on page. It will not be plotted.

Part 2:

# Define the path to the CSV file
csv_path2 <- "/Users/alexandrasniezek/Desktop/DS 3262/taiwan_2023_NationalDefenseReport_subset.csv"

# Read the CSV file into a data frame
csv_df2 <- read.csv(csv_path2, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
docs_p <- tm::Corpus(tm::VectorSource(csv_df2$Line))



docs_clean <- docs_p |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removeNumbers) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removeWords, tm::stopwords("english")) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::stripWhitespace) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::removePunctuation) |>
  tm::tm_map(tm::stemDocument)

documents

tm::removeNumbers), : transformation drops documents

Word Cloud:

library(wordcloud)
freq <- colSums(as.matrix(dtm))
wordcloud(names(freq), freq, max.words = 100)
